data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 1,198,750 believers in Bauchi against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bauchi, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Bauchi with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 4,653,100 people living in Bauchi through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: the state of Bauchi has (about) 1,198,750 people who know Jesus, 1,184,093 people who know about him culturally, and 2,270,257 people who are far from Jesus.
Spirit, I pray that the Jimbin people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Bauchi to agree with you and with one another.
Father, let the threatened of Bauchi, Nigeria know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Bauchi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

location.name: Bauchi
location.people_groups_list: Kadun, Gera, Gerawa, Geji, Kitimi, Zeem
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kadun (18,000), Gera, Gerawa (399,000), Geji (8,200), Kitimi (4,000), Zeem (600)
